scripts.bootstrap: rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -f packages/*/package-lock.json && lerna exec "npm i" --concurrency=1
scripts.test-build: lerna exec "npm run test && npm run build" --concurrency=1
scripts.safe-publish: npm run check-clean-repo && npm run bootstrap && lerna link && npm run build && npm run test-build && lerna publish
